name: FAVISA
0:
”Alexa, tell favisa home to turn on the light.”
”Alexa, tell favisa home to turn off the light.”
”Alexa, tell favisa home to open the curtain.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: favisa home
des:
With the FAVISA Home skill, you can control you home with all the connected devices, lights, curtains, switches,... etc.
You also can turn on your home's security mode.
1. Alexa, tell favisa home turn on the light.
2. Alexa, tell favisa home turn off the light.
3. Alexa, tell favisa home open the curtain.
4. Alexa, tell favisa home close the curtain.
